column1: Local Foods////Not sure how many of the reviews here are based on decor and atmosphere and how many are based on the food. I had the bánh mì
column2: which was an okay (but overpriced) sandwich
column3: and really only tangentially related to the bánh mì experience. As for the sides
column4: the quinoa was great but the soba noddles were strange and wholly unappealing. Middle of the road
column5: this is a cool restaurant with okay food and proud prices.
